open.title: LinkLayer outage | Tongaat
open.description: LinkLayer has informed us of a network outage affecting Tongaat, affected clients will experience no connectivity. The outage is being caused by the municipal contractors currently trenching to install sidewalks. An estimated repair time will only be available once municipal team can supply project completion times and we can ensure that newly installed/repaired fibre will not be damaged again during the scope of the municipal sidewalk project. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
